name: Armor of Vulnerability
curse: Vulnerability to two of three damage types (Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing)

name: Berserker Axe
curse: When damaged in combat, DC 15 Wisdom save or go berserk

name: Demon Armor
curse: Can't doff the armor, disadvantage on attacks and saves against demons

name: Shield of Missile Attraction
curse: Ranged attacks against other targets within 10 feet are redirected to you

name: Sword of Vengeance
curse: Must use this weapon in combat, can't voluntarily release it

name: Bag of Devouring
curse: Interior is actually the gullet of an extradimensional creature

name: Cloak of Poisonousness
curse: Appears to be a Cloak of Protection; applying poison damage and Poisoned condition on don

name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
curse: Appears to be Dust of Disappearance; causes sneezing and Incapacitated condition

name: Javelin of Backbiting
curse: Flies back to hit the wielder on a miss

name: Necklace of Strangulation
curse: Appears to be a Necklace of Prayer Beads; strangles the wearer

name: Periapt of Foul Rotting
curse: Appears to be a Periapt of Health; causes a wasting disease

name: Robe of Vermin
curse: Appears to be a Robe of Useful Items; summons hostile vermin when patches are pulled
